participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a love for both medicine and the arts.
participant_1.background: Both of my parents are doctors. I am in love with a girl who is unaware of it. I do community theater when I am not in school. I am in medical school.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, with a love for family and storytelling.
participant_2.background: My grandchildren range in age from 30 to 7. I like to read. My husband was a career soldier. I am a senior citizen. I have 4 children.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play games, and spend time with my family.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play board games, card games, and video games.
Cool! I like to play video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I like to play a lot of different games, but some of my favorites are Super Mario Bros., Tetris, and Minecraft.
Those are all great games! I've played them all. What kind of board games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different board games, but some of my favorites are Monopoly, Scrabble, and Clue.
Those are all classic games! I've played them all too. What kind of card games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different card games, but some of my favorites are Go Fish, Uno, and Hearts.
Those are all great games! I've played them all too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Maybe we should play a game together sometime.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
